content:
Sure, I can help with that. Here's the plan:

1. Use a shell command to open Spotify.

Let's start with step 1. I'll execute a shell command to open Spotify.

name: run_code
content:
Microsoft Windows [Version 10.0.22621.2283]
(c) Microsoft Corporation. All rights reserved.
C:\Users\shiva\Desktop\mg\merged_project>echo "ACTIVE_LINE:1"
"ACTIVE_LINE:1"
C:\Users\shiva\Desktop\mg\merged_project>start spotify
C:\Users\shiva\Desktop\mg\merged_project>
Spotify should now be open on your computer. Please let me know if you need help with anything else.
